sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Given an unstructured grid on its input this filter generates for each data array in point data dictionary (ie an instance of vtkInformationQuadratureSchemeDefinitionVectorKey). This filter has been introduced to facilitate testing of the vtkQuadrature* classes as these cannot operate with the dictionary. This class is for testing and should not be used for application development.
To create an instance of class vtkQuadratureSchemeDictionaryGenerator, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkQuadratureSchemeDictionaryGenerator

sect1.title: Methods
sect1.para:
The class vtkQuadratureSchemeDictionaryGenerator has several methods that can be used. They are listed below. Note that the documentation is translated automatically from the VTK sources, and may not be completely intelligible. When in doubt, consult the VTK website. In the methods listed below, obj is an instance of the vtkQuadratureSchemeDictionaryGenerator class.
string = obj.GetClassName ()
int = obj.IsA (string name)
vtkQuadratureSchemeDictionaryGenerator = obj.NewInstance ()
vtkQuadratureSchemeDictionaryGenerator = obj.SafeDownCast (vtkObject o)
